name: The Art of Awakening
description: Collect Breath, Awaken objects with Commands, and ascend through the Heightenings.
lore:
Everyone is born with one Breath - the divine spark that animates life. Most
people live their entire lives with just that single Breath, never knowing its
potential. But Breath can be given, taken, and used.

An Awakener learns to collect Breath from others and use it to Awaken inanimate
objects - giving them motion, purpose, even sentience. The process is simple in
concept: touch the object, visualize what you want it to do, drain color from
nearby objects to fuel the Command, and speak the Command phrase.

But mastery takes lifetimes. Different Awakening types have different costs and
complexities. Type I (simple motion) is easy. Type IV (creating Lifeless) requires
hundreds of Breaths and perfect technique.

As you accumulate Breath, you pass through Heightenings - thresholds that grant
passive abilities. The First Heightening (50 Breaths) gives perfect pitch. The
Fifth Heightening (2000 Breaths) grants agelessness. The Tenth Heightening
(50,000 Breaths) allows your Awakenings to spontaneously gain sentience.

The God King himself is said to hold over 50,000 Breaths. The Returned are born
with thousands. Common Awakeners might have 50-500. And most people? Just the
one they were born with, given away for a handful of coins to those who would
use it.

nodes.name: Breath Awareness
nodes.description: Learn to feel and recognize Breath

effects.description: Sense Breath in yourself and others

nodes.lore:
Everyone is born with one Breath - the spark of life given at birth.
You've always had it, but now you learn to feel it, to recognize its presence
in yourself and others. It feels warm, vibrant, alive.

nodes.name: Color Awareness
nodes.description: Learn to see color as life-force
nodes.lore:
Breath is tied to color. The more Breath something has, the more vibrant
its colors. The less Breath, the more drab and gray. You learn to see this
connection - to read vitality through color itself.

nodes.name: Breath Transfer
nodes.description: Learn to give and receive Breath
nodes.lore:
Breath can be transferred from one person to another. The giver must be
willing - or at least, not actively resisting. You learn the technique: the
touch, the intention, the moment of release. It takes only seconds, but feels
like a lifetime.

nodes.name: First Heightening
nodes.description: Reach the First Heightening - perfect pitch
nodes.lore:
At 50 Breaths, you reach the First Heightening. Sounds become crystal clear.
You can identify any note, any voice, any rhythm with perfect accuracy. This
is the first sign that you are no longer quite baseline.

nodes.name: Second Heightening
nodes.description: Reach the Second Heightening - perfect color
nodes.lore:
At 200 Breaths, colors explode in clarity. You can identify the exact hue
of any color instantly, distinguish between shades that others cannot perceive.
This is useful for Awakening - color is power.

nodes.name: Third Heightening
nodes.description: Reach the Third Heightening - life sense
nodes.lore:
At 600 Breaths, you gain perfect life sense. You can feel the auras of
living things nearby - their vitality, their health, their Breath. People
glow with inner light that only you can see.

nodes.name: Fourth Heightening
nodes.description: Reach the Fourth Heightening - perfect instinct
nodes.lore:
At 1000 Breaths, your instincts become supernatural. You sense danger before
it strikes, feel hostile intent like a physical force. Ambushes are nearly
impossible - your body knows to move before your mind understands why.

nodes.name: Fifth Heightening
nodes.description: Reach the Fifth Heightening - agelessness
nodes.lore:
At 2000 Breaths, you stop aging. Disease cannot touch you. You become
functionally immortal, as long as you maintain your Breath. This is why
the God King and Returned are what they are - Breath sustains life itself.

nodes.name: Basic Awakening
nodes.description: Learn the basic technique of Awakening

unlockConditions.description: Must be taught by an Awakener

nodes.lore:
To Awaken an object: touch it, visualize what you want it to do, drain
color from nearby objects to fuel the Command, and speak the Command phrase.
The object will then follow your instructions. Simple Commands cost little
Breath. Complex ones can cost hundreds.

nodes.name: Command Crafting
nodes.description: Learn to craft effective Command phrases
nodes.lore:
The Command phrase matters. "Hold things" works. "Hold this" works better.
"Protect my back" is more effective than "Fight for me." The more specific,
the better - but also the more limiting. You learn the art of Command phrasing.

nodes.name: Clear Visualization
nodes.description: Master the visualization required for Awakening
nodes.lore:
You must hold the image perfectly in your mind: what you want the object
to do, how it should move, its purpose. Distraction breaks the Awakening.
Fear shatters it. Perfect focus is essential.

nodes.name: Efficient Draining
nodes.description: Learn to drain color efficiently from surroundings
nodes.lore:
Awakening requires color as fuel - drained from nearby objects. The more
vibrant the colors, the better. You learn to pull color efficiently, to
sense which objects have the most to give.

nodes.name: Type I Awakening
nodes.description: Master Type I Awakening - simple motion
nodes.lore:
Type I: Make a rope grab things. Make a stick fight. Simple motion for a
single object. This is the bread and butter of Awakening - cheap, reliable,
effective.

nodes.name: Type II Awakening
nodes.description: Master Type II Awakening - complex motion
nodes.lore:
Type II: Make cloth move like a tentacle. Make a cloak defend you actively.
Complex, fluid motion for a single object. Costs more Breath but far more
versatile.

nodes.name: Type III Awakening
nodes.description: Master Type III Awakening - multiple objects
nodes.lore:
Type III: Command an army of sticks, a swarm of ropes. Awaken many objects
at once with a single Command. Expensive but devastating in combat.

nodes.name: Type IV Awakening
nodes.description: Master Type IV Awakening - create Lifeless

effects.description: Create Lifeless - animated corpses with Commands

unlockConditions.description: Must have significant Breath to attempt
Must learn from a Lifeless master

nodes.lore:
Type IV: Awaken a corpse. Give a dead body new life, purpose, obedience.
This is the darkest use of Breath - creating Lifeless. They follow Commands
perfectly, never tire, never question. They are not alive, but they move
and fight as if they were. Costs hundreds of Breaths per corpse.

nodes.name: Willing Transfer
nodes.description: Learn to receive Breath from willing givers
nodes.lore:
The proper way: someone gives their Breath willingly. Perhaps for money,
perhaps for favor, perhaps out of love or duty. The transfer is clean,
complete, without corruption. This is how most Awakeners gain Breath.

nodes.name: Coercive Transfer
nodes.description: Learn to take Breath from the reluctant or coerced
nodes.lore:
If someone is forced to give Breath - through threat, blackmail, or fear -
the transfer becomes difficult. They resist, consciously or not. The Breath
fights you. But it can be done, if you're strong enough.

nodes.name: Return Breath
nodes.description: Learn the difficult art of returning Breath

effects.description: Return Breath to its original owner

nodes.lore:
Giving away Breath is harder than receiving it. Your body fights the loss.
Returning Breath to its original owner is even harder - it must recognize
them, flow back willingly. Few Awakeners ever manage it.

nodes.name: Command Breaking
nodes.description: Learn to destroy others' Commands
nodes.lore:
At the Eighth Heightening, you can break Commands - unraveling the Breath
that animates an Awakened object, returning it to stillness. This is both
defensive (stopping enemy Awakenings) and offensive (wasting their Breath).

nodes.name: Perfect Awakening
nodes.description: Achieve Perfect Awakening - bypass color requirements
nodes.lore:
At the Ninth Heightening, you can Awaken anything regardless of color. No
need to drain colors from the environment. Your Breath is so vast it provides
its own fuel. This is mastery of the art.

nodes.name: Spontaneous Sentience
nodes.description: Achieve the Tenth Heightening - spontaneous sentience
nodes.lore:
At the Tenth Heightening, your Awakenings can spontaneously become sentient.
Not just following Commands, but thinking, choosing, becoming. You create
life itself from lifeless matter. This is the power of gods.

xpSources.description: Return Breath to its original owner
Create a new effective Command phrase
